nodes.text: A B1-Series battle droid was stationed in the Skytop Station on the moon of Ruusan and served under command of General Grievous during the time of the Clone Wars.

In 22 BBY, the Galactic Republic managed to trace the location of the Separatist listening post, the Skytop Station, and sent a clone strike team lead by Jedi General Anakin Skywalker and padawan Ahsoka Tano to take it out.

Meanwhile on the station, this battle droid along with a fellow droid were on patrol. This droid was complaining that the moisture in the moon's atmosphere was corroding his servo-motors. The other droid suggested that he go to level eight to get his head adjusted. Just as they finished chatting, the clone troopers intercepted them, and one of them gave this droid a head adjustment of his own. The other droid was then shot and destroyed before he could do more than yell.
